RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduaзгo em Anбlise de Sistemas pela Pontifнcia Universidade Catуlica de Campinas (1979) e doutorado em Ciкncia da Computaзгo pela Universidade de Reading, Inglaterra (1989). Й professor livre docente da Universidade Estadual de Campinas. Tem experiкncia na бrea de Ciкncia da Computaзгo, com кnfase em Processamento de Lнngua Natural, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: anбlise sintбtica, geraзгo, traduзгo e sumarizaзгo automбtica de textos. Tambйm atua na бrea de Engenharia de Requisitos.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: DEVASSES - DEsign, Verification and VAlidation of large scale, dynamic Service SystEmS
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: The DEVASSES project aims at taking a step forward in the design and deployment of large-scale, dynamic service-based software systems by supporting the transfer of knowledge on novel state of the art methods, techniques, and tools for both design-time and run-time verification and validation. The goal is to reinforce existing partners? cooperation through a coordinated program of exchange of researchers, taking as context a common research problem, which provides the frame for the project scientific activities and cannot currently be tackled by any of the partners individually. The project includes joint research activities, focused training activities, and joint workshops, designed to exploit complementary expertise and to create synergies among the partners, establishing the basis for sustainable future cooperation at different levels, including: co-advising of PhD students, joint organization of international events (workshops, conferences, summer schools, etc.), participation in bilateral project proposals, participation in large-scale international project proposals, etc..
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: The DEVASSES project aims at taking a step forward in the design and deployment of large-scale, dynamic service-based software systems by supporting the transfer of knowledge on novel state of the art methods, techniques, and tools for both design-time and run-time verification and validation. The goal is to reinforce existing partners? cooperation through a coordinated program of exchange of researchers, taking as context a common research problem, which provides the frame for the project scientific activities and cannot currently be tackled by any of the partners individually. The project includes joint research activities, focused training activities, and joint workshops, designed to exploit complementary expertise and to create synergies among the partners, establishing the basis for sustainable future cooperation at different levels, including: co-advising of PhD students, joint organization of international events (workshops, conferences, summer schools, etc.), participation in bilateral project proposals, participation in large-scale international project proposals, etc..
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: DEVASSES - DEsign, Verification and VAlidation of large scale, dynamic Service SystEmS
